website_summaries.verdict: An exceedingly popular Columbia jacket recognized for its ridiculously inexpensive price tag and comfortable fit.
pros: Remarkably soft fleece offers comfortable wear
Offered in various colors and styles

customer_reviews.title: Order one size smaller
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 , one made in China and the other in Bangladesh The Bangladesh looked better made and more warm and fluffy Order one size SMALLER - these are not true to size I am 5'11 , 184 lbs , always wear medium , ordered a small based on the reviews , and the small fits perfect .... trust me on this one The one in the picture is the one made in Bangladesh not china
customer_reviews.author: His Majesty

customer_reviews.title: Runs Slightly Big (Large Purchased)
customer_reviews.text: The jacket has the ample fit for chubby Americans. It's not form fitting. If that's what you're looking for, get a different jacket. I wear between L and x-Large for shirts/jackets and the Large is very roomy and the sleeves are long. I can see using it for workouts - outdoor runs on cold winter days. Good for wearing inside when room temperature is in the mid 60's. Quality is very decent for the price. About a third the cost of comparable The North Face fleece. On Amazon the price fluctuates from day to day - $25 to $36 depending on the color/size. There was no size variation between the two L's that I got.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Defective and tore by second washing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket based on its glowing reviews. It's unfortunate that it didn't live up to them. After its second washing, the jacket tore at the sleeves and the tightening string at the waist came loose. Very poor quality. I expect a name like Columbia to hold up better. I wish I could return but Columbia requires that I return it to them for inspection. I don't think I should pay for shipping back a defective product.
customer_reviews.author: SML

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much given the surprisingly low price, and upon opening the bag, it really doesn't look like it's great quality. I'm fine with that - - after all, you get what you pay for. However, much to my chagrin, the arms are HUGE. Columbia must think we have thighs for arms. I think I can fit 2 pairs of arms in the sleeve. Edit: wore it today. It is badly constructed; the fleece is asymmetrical. The right half of the fleece is bigger/puffier than the left half.
customer_reviews.author: Yu

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this jacket
customer_reviews.text: This fleece jacket looks good (I ordered the gray one) and feels cut correctly. The only thing I don't like is that it isn't as warm as some fleece jackets I've had in the past. It FEELS right, but when a cold wind blows, I feel more of the breeze than I do in my other fleece jackets. But, it is classy looking so I can wear it anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Crowley

customer_reviews.title: "Rocket" red is too pinkish
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with this fleece, except the red color looks stronger in the photo, and it's kind of a light red bordering on dark pink. Help! Oh well. Other odd thing is drawcord at bottom is only on one side. Someone in the comments mentioned returning it for that reasons, assuming it was a defect but it might be just how they make it now.
customer_reviews.author: CandidOne

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I'm a guy (5'9" and weigh 175.) Pretty average. The medium size is not very roomy. Fine with a t-shirt under it, but nothing thicker. This is OK for a cool day, but not a cold day. I mainly wear it indoors on a cold winter day in Tahoe. It would work well under a parka shell, but by itself, it's just OK.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pavich

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black jacket about a month ago and it has been great, it is well made and fits perfectly. I'm about 6' 1'' and the large fits my torso and arm length ideally. In fact this jacket is such a good deal for the price that I ordered a second one that's blue. They're both great and they're more than worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: The black fleece is gray
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice fleece but ... I ordered a black xl, the fleece is NOT black, it is gray. I'll keep it but if you want a black fleece jacket don't order this.
customer_reviews.author: dutchie0801

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket but color is misrepresented
customer_reviews.text: The color " Buffalo " which is represented here as a dark brown is just grey, I emailed Amazon customer service and they next day aired a new jacket asap but it was still the same grey jacket. This is still a top quality great jacket but there is no brown option...sorry UPSers..
customer_reviews.author: Txuser

customer_reviews.title: Jacket shed fleece and felt thin. Reading other reviews ...
customer_reviews.text: Jacket shed fleece and felt thin. Reading other reviews, it may be possible that I got a knock-off jacket. Ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Narrow arms
customer_reviews.text: I have had many Columbia fleeces over the years. This one is a lot narrower in the arms and does not fit comfortably over long sleeve shirts. Note that the model is wearing a T shirt in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: GiddyCal

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: It's not high tech fashion, but if you're looking for a well made simple fleece to throw over a t-shirt or collared shirt this fits the bill. Nothing fancy just great comfort and warmth....Go for it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marley

customer_reviews.title: Good, but...
customer_reviews.text: I liked a lot. It's warm enough, better than I thought. The size was very precise. The only issue I had is that I ordered the white color and got the dark green. I liked the color though and I didn't return it as I should.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Farion Jr

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disappointed with the color
customer_reviews.text: Slightly disappointed with the color. Order black and I had to check the order to confirm I ordered the correct color....I did but it has a grey hue. Also the drawstring switching was finished, unraveled during first wearing. Purchased Columbia because I thought it was a quality product. Sad to say its not.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: I use it as a house shirt in winter
customer_reviews.text: Just adding another good review. These are typical Columbia quality and nice color choices. I get so much wear out of these ........ they are soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald B. Doebke

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: Be cautious choosing a color if you want black. Deep Woods Black is Green! So disappointed when it arrived. It didn't look green on the screen when i went through the color choices.
customer_reviews.author: Shopsalot

customer_reviews.title: Not well made.
customer_reviews.text: The pocket stitching came apart the 2nd day I wore it. Doesn't seem well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Ingle

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightweight fleece that I bought to match a pair ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight fleece that I bought to match a pair of sneakers that I purchased. I got the commando/shark color and it is way lighter than in the picture. Other than that it fits like a glove and the length is perfect. Would have been five stars if the color was on point.
customer_reviews.author: Nurzesrp

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, came the next day. Go Prime! It fits really good. I should have ordered a size up so a hoodie can go under it but whatever I like it. Also.... the navy is a darker/actually navy than shown in the picture. Still nice & for the price.. its good.
customer_reviews.author: Jemell C.

customer_reviews.title: It was good but too big
customer_reviews.text: The 'Small' was a size too big for my boyfriend, whose waist is 30 inches. I returned this product for this reason. Otherwise good product, but the small I received was otherwise not matching the description posted on the size fit guide.
customer_reviews.author: TheLittleOne

customer_reviews.title: The fit is very good everywhere except the neck and collar
customer_reviews.text: 5'11, 160lbs. The fit is very good everywhere except the neck and collar. The neck and collar area are larger than necessary, but I'll still wear it.
customer_reviews.author: it5ju5talx

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend it buying from online
customer_reviews.text: Used very cheap fleece. This is my third one. Compared to old one, it is a garage fleece. I do not recommend it buying from online.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: hands down, the most comfortable jacket i've ever owned. i have been wearing about 1 month, so i am concerned about durability. will post updates as applicable.
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than size marked
customer_reviews.text: Color was great. I purchased a 2XL. It was much too small. I compared it to another 2XL Columbia Fleece Jacket I have and it was much smaller. I believe it was mis-sized. I am sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis C

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear T-shirts of size Large (L) I purchased this one on Large as well and It fitted quite good. It's very soft and yields to you good heat. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket, fits well, and is incredibly warm.
customer_reviews.text: I'm one of those guys that wears a jacket casually. This is not that jacket in warm weather. But for colder temps (not necessarily freezing) this is a great jacket thats not too puffy, and looks great! Wear it with a button up shirt and tie and still look acceptable. Great jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Not sure whether Columbia makes jackets in different weights. This is very light weight and feels more like a flannel than fleece. The zip pockets zip up rather than down (from top of pocket to bottom).
customer_reviews.author: e7

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! For the price it was much more than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mandocommando

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit wasn't great, definitely bigger than expected. Still is very warm
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I'm A Big Guy So I Needed about 3x-6x according to how the sweater fits but get your size that you get most of your close in. It's very warm & light and it's in style now!
customer_reviews.author: Rome1215

customer_reviews.title: Size is too big
customer_reviews.text: Size is too big..I am 5'5" and very athletic. Bought the small size and it hangs on me like a blanket..probably for someone at least 6 ft tall and average body build. The quality seems nice. I wish they made regular sizes as well.
customer_reviews.author: techie

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and fashionable. I thought the sizing was spot on. A great deal, especially for the price. Can be worn in most climates.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Kyle Walker

customer_reviews.title: Had to return for a larger size
customer_reviews.text: I ready the reviews that said that these jackets run large, so I ordered the same size as my t-shirts. I am returning the jacket now to get the next size up. Other than that, the jacket looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy P. Bakner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased four of these fleece. The orange and gray one looks amazing. It is my favorite out the four colors I had purchased.
customer_reviews.author: woodcutter457

customer_reviews.title: Substandard Quality!
customer_reviews.text: For this price, I have bought stuff with significantly better quality. I can't understand how the consumer ratings are so high. I feel duped.
customer_reviews.author: Venkat Mungara

customer_reviews.title: Right color, Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket in Medium size and Charcoal color. While the color is just right, the size is however different. I wanted to order a Large size but going by all the reviews and people saying it runs a little too large I thought of downsizing and ordered a Medium. Unfortunately, Medium is a Medium, it isn't Medium Large. So if L is your size, I suggest you stick to L. I've again placed an order, but this time in L size. Let's see how it turns out.
customer_reviews.author: Krits

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality, too big size
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the product. I generally wears Medium sometimes Large. I have ordered M size, but the item that came seems like XXL and very cheap looking. Not Columbia quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mesut Fidanoglu

customer_reviews.title: Great, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Good buy. Looks great, feels warm, good lines and shape. I bought the two tone grey and black, medium, and I am 5 10 170 lbs athletic build. Fits perfect. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: RichiK

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket, runs large
customer_reviews.text: This is a great jacket by Columbia. The fleece is very soft and comfortable. The zipper looks to be well made and should last a while. I ordered the Charcoal Heather and the color looks great. I am usually in between a Large and an XL in shirts and the XL was way to big in this jacket. If your on the fence about sizing, go with the smaller of the two. I have worn this jacket in 40 degree weather and it actually kept me pretty warm. I wasn't outside for long though. Overall a great purchase, buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Darl Clarkenberry

product_meta.title: Columbia Men's Steens Mountain Full Zip 2.0, Soft Fleece with Classic Fit
product_meta.description:
A soft, fleece layer is a must for any winter wardrobe—that's why the Men's Steens Mountain Full Zip 2.0 Fleece Jacket exists. Columbia's soft, winter-ready staple is the ultimate warmth provider and everyday style piece.

You're bound to be warm and worry-free in this fleece jacket crafted of our super-soft 100% polyester MTR filament fleece. It's the perfect layering piece and first line of defense to combat the cold. When constant activity and high-energy are a factor, a classic fit is necessary; it allows for comfortable movement that you need. Zippered side pockets keep his small items secure (including your hands when the outdoors get extra cold). An added bonus is the warm collar that's flexible enough to wear it up or down, depending on desired level of toastiness.

Columbia offers our fleece jacket in multiple staple colors and size. To ensure the size you choose is right, utilize our sizing chart and the following measurement instructions: For the sleeves, start at the center back of your neck and measure across the shoulder and down to the sleeve. If you come up with a partial number, round up to the next even number. For the chest, measure at the fullest part of the chest, under the armpits and over the shoulder blades, keeping the tape measure firm and level.
feature_bullets: SOFT FABRIC: This Columbia Men's Steens Mountain Full Zip 2.0 Fleece Jacket is crafted of ultra-soft 100% polyester MTR filament fleece for the perfect amount of warmth.
HANDY FEATURES: This fleece jacket features two side zippered security pockets to keep your small items secure.
ULTIMATE COMFORT: With a collared neck and zippered closure, you're sure to be protected from the frigid cold.
CLASSIC FIT: A modern classic fit and with a soft, lightweight feel make this fleece jacket a staple for comfortable outdoor activity.
VERSATILE: Soft and warm, this fleece jacket is the perfect layer for any winter activity.
